title: Welcome
text:
Substantively, I am interested in the challenges to electoral accountability and representation in the Global South. Methodologically, I develop standards to navigate research design tradeoffs in experiments and quasi-experiments.
I received my PhD from the Department of Political Science at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign in 2021. Before joining McMaster, I was a postdoctoral fellow at the Center for Inter-American Policy and Research at Tulane University.
